[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 9,985,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 5,725,000,000 + 4,245,000,000 ) with a value of 9,970,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : NOK Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -6 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6
Rule Element Id:9542 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300SX4Z9T612Q0N59/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/ah-2021-12-31-en.zip/ah-2021-12-31-en/reports/ah-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 3682

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1004005 - Statement - Statement of cash flows, indirect method (Statement) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of -1,826,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -1,823,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to -1,826,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ CashFlowsFromUsedInOperations -1,640,000,000 + IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 1,000,000 + InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -214,000,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 30,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1004005 - Statement - Statement of cash flows, indirect method (Statement). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : -1,826,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300SX4Z9T612Q0N59/2021-12-31/ESEF/NO/0/ah-2021-12-31-en.zip/ah-2021-12-31-en/reports/ah-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 3682
